answerText: silicon or Si [10] Tetramethylsilane, which consists of silicon surrounded by four methyl groups, is used as an internal standard for this spectroscopic technique.

subject: Science
question: Question: Very pure crystals of this element may be generated using the Czochralski process. FTPE:   [10] Name this element whose oxide is the major component of asbestos and quartz.
